Posts.Content: I had mine on the 2nd December. Didn't have a drain and had two episodes that required draining. Still get swelling now but it is uncomfortable as opposed to painful.The funny feeling in the arm is still there. I am hoping it goes away soon,Â  I drove on Christmas day and started some light exercises last week. I work for myself in a very flexible business so beyond a couple of days after the operation I have worked most days. Be kind to yourself. If you can rest then do. Do your exercises, they help. I saw a physio last week and she gave me some more pointers and checked that my movements were okay. Hang in there. You get to the end....eventually....
Posts.Title: Axillary Node Clearence
